snippet: Walt Disney Studios said that it would show films from its Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Lucasfilm banners on Netflix, the first time that one of Hollywood’s Big Six studios has chosen Web streaming over pay television.
abstract: Walt Disney Studios said that it would show films from its Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Lucasfilm banners on Netflix, the first time that one of Hollywood’s Big Six studios has chosen Web streaming over pay television.
lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Studios said that it would show films from its Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Lucasfilm banners on Netflix, the first time that one of Hollywood’s Big Six studios has chosen Web streaming over pay television.Read more »

headline.main: Netflix Reaches Deal to Show New Disney Films in 2016
